author: SClarkPhysics
body:
This PR changes the TrackJet Emulation Clustering algorithm to more closely match what is done in firmware. Specifically, it changes the way the binning is done in the  plane. We also change the python config file so that the max eta is appropriately set, which is used in the APx workflow

This has already been merged to cms-l1t-offline:phase2-l1t-integration-13_3_0_pre3 via [PR 1170](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1170) . See discussion there
title: Emulator cluster firmware style
